name: Bouda
description: A medium-sized fiend with hyena-human hybrid characteristics, showcasing impressive physical attributes.
memorable: Its ability to change shape and consume the organs of corpses make it a unique and sinister adversary.
goals: To ambush opponents, manipulate others through deception, and gain strength by consuming corpses.
relations: Related to other fiends, may serve a higher fiend or operate independently.
environment: Typically found in dark, desolate areas, often solitary or in small groups.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison, high Strength for melee attacks, skilled in stealth and intimidation.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magic and silvered weapons, susceptible to specific countermeasures against its abilities.
attacks: Multiattack with a Bite and Mephitic Claw, causing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ravenous Gorge allows it to gain temporary hit points by consuming recent corpses.
senses: The Bouda can sense magic within 30 feet and detect celestials or consecrated areas by scent within 60 feet.
skills: Highly skilled in Athletics, Stealth, Deception, and Intimidation, allowing for effective ambush tactics.
additional_information: Has damage immune to fire and poison
Can change shape between human, hyena, and hybrid forms
Has a lingering stench effect from its Defiling Smear ability
Can gain temporary hit points by consuming corpses
test_queries: medium-sized fiend that can change shape
fiend immune to fire and poison
